items.title: Despite Stiff Opposition, an Alabama City Changes Its Laws to Accommodate Data Centers
bullets: • The city of Bessemer, Alabama, voted to allow the location of data centers in areas designated for light industrial use
• Project Marvel is a $14.4 billion hyperscale data center development set to encompass 700 acres and include 18 buildings
• Locals have expressed concerns about excessive energy usage, increased utility rates, noise pollution

items.title: Scientists just found a molecule that could stop Parkinson’s in its tracks
bullets: • Researchers have designed a peptide that prevents the deadly misfolding of alpha-synuclein, the protein behind Parkinson’s and some dementias
• In lab and animal tests, it stabilized the protein and improved motor function
• The work demonstrates the power of rational drug design in tackling brain diseases that have long lacked effective treatments

• The Biden-era plans had ended coal leasing in the prolific Powder River Basin and limited access to oil and gas development
